data.title: Meditation to Invoke the Master’s Touch: A 2.5 Hour Practice with Gong Relaxation
data.meta_description: Meditation to Invoke the Master’s Touch: A 2.5 Hour Practice with Gong Relaxation "Aad Sach, Jugaad Sach, Hai Bhee Sach, Naanak Hosee Bhee Sach". This mantra will give you the power of the Master's Touch. Open to all serious meditators.
data.meta_site_name: Yoga At The Ashram - The Baba Siri Chand Yoga and Retreat Center
data.text:
Meditation to Invoke the Master’s Touch

a 2.5 hour practice with Gong Relaxation afterward

“Aad Sach, Jugaad Sach, Hai Bhee Sach, Naanak Hosee Bhee Sach”

Saturday, September 21, 2019 from 8:30 am to 12:30 pm

Led by Dr. HariKirin

Open to all committed meditators

$20 Donation will be shared with

the Worcester County Food Bank & Millis Ecumenical Food Bank

Add Lunch when you sign up for an additional $20

(Please Pre-Register for Food Planning)

Make it a day: Add Dr. Sat Bir Singh’s Research Workshop 1:30-5:30pm:

This mantra will give you the power of the Master’s Touch. And when you perfect this mudra with the Jupiter fingers touching, chanting the mantra in one sitting for 2-1/2 hours, one tenth of your day, it will bring you this Touch. There is no power or magic on this planet that can stop it. It has a permutation, combination, projection and power which brings the entire Prakirti, the Existence, into the being of Purkha, the Divinity.

All will be grateful to you; you will find grace, respect, love, and satisfaction that you are serving the creation of God. Then you will see God in everybody, in yourself, and in every facet of life. It will come true: ‘If you don’t see God in all, you don’t see God at all.’ You will see God.

Download Flyer

REGISTER
